original_text: Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God.
korean_text: 아무 것도 염려하지 말고 다만 모든 일에 기도와 간구로, 너희 구할 것을 감사함으로 하나님께 아뢰라

sentences.original_text: but in every thing by prayer and supplication
let your requests be made known unto God
